actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of House Resolution 457 of the 92d Congress as enacted into law by the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1972 (relating to allowances of Members, officers, and committees of the House of Representatives).

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of H. Res. 457 of the 92nd Congress, as enacted into law by the Supplemental Appropriations Act of 1972, which provide authority to the Committee on House Administration to adjust allowances by order of the Committee for Members, standing committees, leadership offices, and officers of the House.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of House Resolution 457 of the 92d Congress as enacted into law by the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1972 (relating to allowances of Members, officers, and committees of the House of Representatives).
